tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.connection

Interface ConnectionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectionManager, CurrentRemoteFragment

    public interface ConnectionListener
    Listens for changes in the connection state
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael McKey

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnected()
      Called whenever the connection is initiated
      void onDisconnected(java.lang.String reason)
      Called whenever the connection ends
      void onReceivedMessages(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> unreadMessages)
      Called when messages are received

    • Method Detail

      • onConnected

        void onConnected()
        Called whenever the connection is initiated

      • onDisconnected

        void onDisconnected(@Nullable
                    java.lang.String reason)
        Called whenever the connection ends
        Parameters:
        reason - the reason the device has been disconnected(null disconnected normally)

      • onReceivedMessages

        void onReceivedMessages(@NonNull
                        java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> unreadMessages)
        Called when messages are received
        Parameters:
        unreadMessages - a list of the new messages that haven't been processed yet
